featured.text: Over the years, people have been curious about the way they deal with disturbances arising from the environment, and the operations underlying their responses as a group.
However, I didn’t want to ___(37)__ a disturbance, so I sat down and prepared to obey the rule.

definition.en_def: An interruption of a settled and peaceful condition.
definition.example: The loud noise caused a disturbance in the quiet neighborhood.
